last_episode_to_air.name: Stan Against Evie
last_episode_to_air.overview: Haurus demands Stan kill Evie in return for killing Constable Eccles and ending the curse on Willard's Mill; another demon tells Stan how to defeat Haurus but the cost could be high.

name: Stan Against Evil
overview: An aging police sheriff who has recently lost his position due to an angry outburst begrudgingly joins an alliance with new sheriff, Evie Barret to battle angry demons haunting their small New Hampshire town.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3 picks up immediately after the events of the Season 2 finale, with Stan and Evie back in Willard’s Mill dealing with the consequences of Stan traveling through time to save his dead wife Claire.  In doing so, he inadvertently opened a portal between the Land of the Living and the Land of the Dead…allowing evil forces to truly take over the town and even some of its inhabitants. Although always the skeptic at first, Stan must work with Evie to once more save the town – even if it means making a literal deal with the devil.

episodes.name: Dig Me Up, Dig Me Down
episodes.overview: After the death of his wife, Sheriff Miller is forced into retirement and replaced by Evie Barret. Evie discovers the town is possessed by demons, and that Stan's wife was the only one keeping them at bay. Stan and Evie must join forces to stay alive.

episodes.name: Know, Know, Know Your Goat
episodes.overview: Stan's daughter Denise goes blueberry picking and comes home with a pet goat that turns out to be The Baphomet, an ancient, goat-based demon who wants both Stan and Dense dead. All because someone wanted blueberries.

episodes.name: Let Your Love Groan
episodes.overview: Stan, Evie and Denise go speed dating and suddenly find themselves involved with their perfect match. Only they also find themselves growing weak and rapidly aging. Even Denise, who's perfect match was a pot-bellied pig named Murgatroyd.

episodes.name: Life Orr Death
episodes.overview: Evie attempts to rescue Stan’s prized possession, his Bobby Orr hockey stick, from the church donation pile, only to find herself transported into the spirit world where she too, is on trial for witchcraft.

episodes.name: Ouija Bored
episodes.overview: A strange crop of flowers starts growing in town, with each bloom bringing a new supernatural horror. Evie attempts to summon Stan's dead wife, Claire to help her stop them.

episodes.name: I'm Gleaning My Coven
episodes.overview: Denise gets mixed up with a group of goth kids who come to town hoping to contact a demon. Unfortunately, they succeed, and Denise finds herself possessed by the demon and therefore not on Stan's good side.

episodes.name: Spider Walk With Me
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger shows up on Stan's door with knowledge of the curse he and Evie are fighting. At the same time, Willard's Mill residents start getting killed by a giant spider.

episodes.name: Level Boss
episodes.overview: A mysterious girl runs out into the street, forcing Evie to swerve into a fatal car accident that she must relive over and over and over again.

episodes.name: Black Hat Society (1)
episodes.overview: Stan meets descendants of a Wiccan coven, the Black Hat Society, who help him start to solve the mystery of Evelyn Barret.

episodes.name: Black Hat Society (2)
episodes.overview: Stan can travel back in time to save Evie, but she will forever be a ghost unless they can get rid of someone else from the past.

episodes.name: Curse of the Werepony
episodes.overview: When Evie's ex-husband buys a pony for their daughter, Evie discovers having a horse can be deadly.

episodes.name: Girls' Night
episodes.overview: When the bachelor on a TV dating show hypnotizes Evie, and the same man bets on Stan’s life, they all become prey to a murderous game of fate.

episodes.name: The Eyes of Evie Barret
episodes.overview: When Evie wears an antique ring, she begins having dreams of killing people…who actually turn up dead.

episodes.name: Hex Marks the Tot
episodes.overview: Denise gets a job babysitting a demon baby that dangerously feeds off her affection. Kevin gets beaten up by a baby, which is not a coincidence.

episodes.name: Mirror Mirror
episodes.overview: When Stan summons Gerard DuQuette to help him save Claire, he faces an evil replica of himself.

episodes.name: A Hard Day’s Night
episodes.overview: Stan travels back in time to save Claire and he succeeds, but dies in the process, forcing Evie to go back and save him; Leon loses his head over a new gal.

episodes.name: Hell Is What You Make It
episodes.overview: Evie is arrested for murder and committed to a psychiatric hospital. Stan attempts to rescue her, but everyone thinks he's a demon. There may be a new way to free the souls cursed by Constable Eccles.

episodes.name: The Hex Files
episodes.overview: Two eerily familiar paranormal investigators arrive to investigate the Black Hat Society. Stan searches for a bigger evil ally that could help defeat Constable Eccles.

episodes.name: Larva My Life
episodes.overview: A disgraced birthday entertainer disrupts the peace in Willard's Mill. Evie's ex-husband, Kenny, comes to town, and transforms into a caterpillar monster, The Kennypillar, that terrorizes Willard's Mill.

episodes.name: The Demon Who Came in From the Heat
episodes.overview: A murderous hitchhiker terrorizes Willard's Mill. Stan befriends a laid back demon and attempts to find a spell that will free the souls captured by Constable Eccles. Denise and Kevin go on a date. Niiiiice.

episodes.name: Nubbin but Trouble
episodes.overview: An antique store owner is murdered by an evil puppet, who then begins summoning spirits from Hell. Stan brews homemade beer with a debilitating side effect.

episodes.name: Vampire Creek
episodes.overview: Denise believes she's won a contest, but instead gets trapped in the fictional world of Vampire Creek, a TV show about teenage vampires. Stan, Evie & Kevin must find and rescue her before she is turned into a vampire.

episodes.name: Intensive Scare Unit
episodes.overview: Stan goes for a prostate exam but must escape when the hospital turns demonic.

episodes.name: Stan Against Evie
episodes.overview: Haurus demands Stan kill Evie in return for killing Constable Eccles and ending the curse on Willard's Mill; another demon tells Stan how to defeat Haurus but the cost could be high.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3 picks up immediately after the events of the Season 2 finale, with Stan and Evie back in Willard’s Mill dealing with the consequences of Stan traveling through time to save his dead wife Claire.  In doing so, he inadvertently opened a portal between the Land of the Living and the Land of the Dead…allowing evil forces to truly take over the town and even some of its inhabitants. Although always the skeptic at first, Stan must work with Evie to once more save the town – even if it means making a literal deal with the devil.
